segments.text: While you are thinking about what you might like to order for dinner , would you like to order your drinks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me where your wine list is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The wine list is posted right there on the board .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we order a mixed drink in this restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have a wide selection of mixed drinks available from our bar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any house specials that you could recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our most popular drinks are our Cuervo Gold margaritas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like a good choice for me . May I have one , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I bring that to you on the rocks , or would you like it blended ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please bring it to me on the rocks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like it with no salt , please .
segments.speaker: S2
